00016     function PRAYFile($reader=null) {
00017         $this->blocks = array();
00018         if($reader instanceof IReader) {
00019             $this->reader = $reader;
00020             $this->Parse();
00021         } else {
00022             $this->parsed = true; //make sure no one tries to parse it...
00023         }
00024     }
00025     
00027     private function Parse() {
00028         if(!$this->parsed) {
00029             if($this->ParseHeader()) {
00030                 while($this->ParseBlockHeader()) {
00031                 }
00032                 $this->parsed = true;
00033                 //print_r($this->blocks);
00034                 return $this->blocks;
00035             } else {
00036                 echo "Failed at block header: NOT A PRAY FILE";
00037                 return FALSE;
00038             }
00039         }
00040         
00041         return $this->blocks;
00042     }
00046     public function Compile() {
00047         $compiled = 'PRAY';
00048         foreach($this->blocks as $block) {
00049             $compiled .= $block->Compile();
00050         }
00051         return $compiled;
00052     }

00057         //TODO: Check block name is unique (in blocks of the same type).
00058         $this->blocks[] = $block;

00065     public function GetBlocks($type=FALSE) { //gets all blocks or one type of block
00066         if(!$type) {
00067             return $this->blocks;
00068         } else {
00069             if(is_string($type)) {
00070                 $type = array($type);
00071             }
00072             $retblocks = array();
00073             foreach($this->blocks as $block) {
00074                 if(in_array($block->GetType(),$type)) {
00075                     $retblocks[] = $block;
00076                 }
00077             }
00078             return $retblocks;
00079         }
00080     }
00082     public function GetBlockByName($name) {
00083         foreach($this->blocks as $blockid => $block) {
00084             
00085             if($block->GetName() == $name) {
00086                 return $block;
00087             }
00088         }
00089         return null;
00090     }
00092     private function ParseHeader() {
00093         if($this->reader->Read(4) == "PRAY") {
00094             return true;
00095         } else {
00096             return false;
00097         }
00098     }
00103     private function ParseBlockHeader() {
00104         $blocktype = $this->reader->Read(4);
00105         if($blocktype=="") {
00106             return false;
00107         }
00108         $name = trim($this->reader->Read(128));
00109         if($name=="") {
00110             return false;
00111         }
00112         $length = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00113         if($length===false) {
00114             return false;
00115         }
00116         $fulllength = $this->reader->ReadInt(4); //full means uncompressed
00117         if($fulllength===false) {
00118             return false;
00119         }
00120         $flags = $this->reader->ReadInt(4);
00121         if($flags===false) {
00122             return false;
00123         }
00124         //if we make the content here, we don't have to write the same line or two ten or more times :)
00125         $content = $this->reader->Read($length);
00126         $this->blocks[] = PrayBlock::MakePrayBlock($blocktype,$this,$name,$content,$flags);
00127         
00128         return true;
00129     }
